title: Hi大家好俺是新人多多关照【求金粒升级】
author: lvgege
txt_content:
新人嘛，也不知道说什么，在这里群各位大神告知怎么搞那个积分咯，谢谢咯。
{:10_492:}搞啊搞搞啊搞。：大神呐~~~~赏俺点金粒吧

                                ：小伙子，俺看你不错就收你为小弟了，俺是可以带你飞黄腾达滴人咯。


[grid_ghast_tear][grid_ghast_tear][grid_ghast_tear][grid_ghast_tear][grid_ghast_tear][grid_ghast_tear][grid_ghast_tear][grid_ghast_tear][grid_ghast_tear][grid_ghast_tear][grid_ghast_tear][grid_ghast_tear][grid_ghast_tear][grid_ghast_tear][grid_ghast_tear][grid_ghast_tear][grid_ghast_tear][grid_ghast_tear][grid_ghast_tear][grid_ghast_tear][grid_ghast_tear][grid_ghast_tear][grid_ghast_tear][grid_ghast_tear][grid_ghast_tear][grid_ghast_tear][grid_ghast_tear]

{:10_498:}  希望大家给点金粒咯

{:10_503:}不给的都是坏淫 ...[chest]快快扔来吧233333333333





{:10_507:} 最近听说人气比金粒好多了，不过俺也不懂的啦，







各位就到这里啦。谢谢，
